decision_conditions: <p>5. Notwithstanding the plans submitted, prior to the commencement of the window replacement works, the following is provided to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority:</p><p><br></p><p>a) existing and proposed elevations and sections to a scale of 1:10</p><p><br></p><p>b) a sample glazing bar cross section with glazing is provided on site to compare with the existing to ensure a match.</p><p><br></p><p><br></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="">Notwithstanding the
detail on the submitted drawing(s) the proposed rooflights in the rear extension
shall, as far as is possible, be flush with the roofslope (conservation grade
rooflights).<font face="Arial, sans-serif"><span style="font-size: 11pt;"><o:p></o:p></span></font></p>
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
description:
Replacement of
front door and all windows; existing ground floor level to be lowered; single
storey rear extension; outbuilding to the rear
